item.description:
Since I was going to go to the fireworks alone about 7 or 8 that evening on the East Hartford Side, parking in the lot of Coca Cola, there are closer ones but i like this lot, besides by the time its over and i get to the car, the traffic is almost all gone...

I decided to make this a simple posting, not going to hunt in the crowds to find others, if by accident, great..but to have the flexibility to walk around and pick a good spot as i or we see it.

so if a few of you are interested, im going to make spagetty, get rid of the rest of the shrimp, and whatever else i have..not paying 5 bucks for a disgusting low quality hot dog or 3 bucks for a water..or what ever they charge now...
although i would buy a steak or sausage sandwithch..
I can still make one at home...

Ok getting to AL's


I live at 321 Silas Deane Highway in Wethersfield..its a business section but i have one of the last 12 or so houses left on the street..(the 5th or 6th one down on the right or west side) its not that bad..anyway..from hartford area take 84 east to 91 south...take exit #28..its the 5/15 exit to wethersfield..from there take the next exit on to rte 99 = Silas Deane Hwy, take right off exit..you cant turn left anyway here..go strait on Silas Deane..pass Price Right store and Murcury Oil Gas Satation...further a police station and Drunkin donuts...2 streets on right cumberland then oxford....now..on the left is a bunch of businesses..the blue house is a hair dresser shop..im directly across from it in a small off white little ranch...
On the mail box on the side of the house the #321 is in orange/red...
I will put 2 traffic cones on the end of the driveway...
they will stick out im sure...

Pull way into the back yard...
Im parked at the house next door...
if my yard is full, then park there but leave the left garage door accessable for my sister..

Later its to Coca Cola...in east hartford on Main street,
a right off the bridge over the ct river then a right to behind DeAngelo's by the trailer park part of the fenced coke lot...then walk about 1.3 miles.. yes you have to walk..you need it any way so there...
Bring something if you want...we can make it what we want..

group.name: Connecticut Theatre Group Arts-Theater Events Group Discount

item.name: Small Simple Dinner before heading out to the East Hartford Side, Fireworks
